amendment.description: To require the identification of environmental conditions at military installations closed or realigned as part of the 2005 round of defense base closure and realignment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2553 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2553 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12786) To require the identification of environmental conditions at military installations closed or realigned as part of the 2005 round of defense base closure and realignment.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2553 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2553 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Snowe.
